feed.title: Gladys Assistant Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.50.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Zigbee2mqtt: Adding IKEA e1524/e1810 by @paddyponchero in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2120
  • Add userId to the where clause to prevent the exposure of sessions by @bnematzadeh in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2168
  • LAN Manager: Should save a 0 once if a device is not discovered by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2164
  • Airplay speakers by @bertrandda in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2143
  • Fix order of argument -rtsp_transport in ffmpeg command by @cailholm in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2173
  • Improve LAN Manager wording by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2174
  • add new integration Free Mobile SMS by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2157

New Contributors

  • @paddyponchero made their first contribution in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2120
  • @cailholm made their first contribution in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.49.0...v4.50.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.50.1
entry.content:

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.50.0...v4.50.1

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.50.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve mobile view on scene list by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2176
  • Fix local Zigbee2mqtt version to 1.42.0 by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2180

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.50.1...v4.50.2

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.51.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ZwaveJS scene controller by @sescandell in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2178
  • Upgrade axios to fix request chunked response by @bertrandda in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2182
  • zigbee2mqtt_smart_doorbell_HEIMAN_HS2DB by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2184
  • Lixee_TIC: migration selector et external_id by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2181
  • Fix builds: Stop re-installing npm by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2195
  • Zigbee2mqtt: Add aqara WXKG15LM by @William-De71 in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2192
  • Fix MQTT auto-reconnect with custom topic issues + update mqtt by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2197

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.50.2...v4.51.0

entry.title: New release for Gladys Assistant: v4.52.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Slugify selector: Remove leading & trailing dash by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2202
  • Chart: Fix timezone issues by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2203
  • Fix validation issue when creating a new user and forgetting the password by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2205
  • Chart: color cannot be null, fix bug on edit, move & remove of device_feature by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2201
  • Gladys Plus: Improve error handling on login page by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2208
  • Call to local admin routes should be checked in Gladys Plus as well by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2209
  • Scene: Add 4 random characters at the end of selectors to avoid duplicate scene issue by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2210
  • Chart: Improve yAxis label formatting for small & large numbers by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2206
  • Correction of the step edition boxes room temperature and humidity by @Terdious in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2200
  • Performance: Add a promise cache for pending get requests by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2211
  • Fix slider: should be full width by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2212
  • Chart: Rollback smart rounding of values, only keep small number part by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2216
  • Scene: Fix search lag on list by @Pierre-Gilles in https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/pull/2215

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GladysAssistant/Gladys/compare/v4.51.0...v4.52.0
